data.name: Trainz Plus DLC - Southern Pacific - EMD SD50 Black Widow
data.detailed_description:
The SD50 was the main competitor for the GE Dash-7. This SD50 "Black Widow" was owned by the Southern Pacific Transportation Company (reporting mark SP), earlier Southern Pacific Railroad and Southern Pacific Company, and usually simply called the Southern Pacific or (from the railroad's initials) Espee.

Features include:

Auto Running Numbers
Night Lighting
Gyra Light
Emergency Light

data.short_description: The SD50 was the main competitor for the GE Dash-7. This SD50 "Black Widow" was owned by the Southern Pacific Transportation Company (reporting mark SP), usually simply called the Southern Pacific or (from the railroad's initials) Espee.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
